summary: A team of navy personnel stationed at a temporary base at the bottom of the ocean and tasked with setting up nuclear missiles discovers a huge underwater cavern which houses a giant prehistoric creature.
cast: Taurean Blacque|Nancy Everhard|Greg Evigan|Miguel Ferrer|Nia Peeples|Matt McCoy|Cindy Pickett|Marius Weyers|Elya Baskin|Thom Bray|Ronn Carroll|Chris Walas
keywords: laboratory|psychotronic film|gore|columbia tristar|low budget sci fi movie
title: Profundidad seis
